channel.title: About me on Anna's blog
channel.description: Recent content in About me on Anna's blog

item.title: About this blog
item.description: Content of this blog I am starting this blog to share my knowledge in mathematics, modelling, statistics, programming (mainly in R and Python) and data science. During all the time of my studying from bachelor to PhD I always had an inspiring cases that really worth sharing. That is why this blog exists and that reminds me about Leo Tolstoy’s quote “You should write only when you cannot help but write” (in his diary from October 19th, 1909) and this is truly my story.
